alert.note: Alert for Kuskokwim Delta (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 03 at 10:07PM AKDT until November 04 at 4:00PM AKDT by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM AKDT FRIDAY... * WHAT...Blowing snow expected. Visibility reduced to as low as one half mile. Total snow accumulations of up to 4 inches. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Kuskokwim Delta. * WHEN...Until 4 PM AKDT Friday. * IMPACTS...Expect difficult travel conditions. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The blowing snow threat will begin near the coast this evening and move further inland on Friday morning.The primarily showery nature of precipitation expected with this system, combined with its fast motion may limit the period of low visibility to a few hours at any given location. Snow will then taper off from west to east through midday Friday. Freshly fallen snow may continue to be lofted until winds diminish Friday afternoon, allowing visibility to improve.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.
